Rome, some time in 46 B.c.

I have many strong reasons for my regard for 1 Manius Curius b who has a banking business at Patrae. A friendship of very long standing subsists between us, which began when he first entered the Forum, and at Patrae not only on several previous occasions, but also very lately‚ during this most lamentable war, his house has been unreservedly thrown open to me ; had there been need, I should have used it as my own.
